courses/assignments/get.description: Get the information for a course assignment.

courses/assignments/list.description: List the assignments in the course.

courses/assignments/submissions/analysis.description: Get the result of a individual analysis for the specified submissions.
Get the result of a pairwise analysis for the specified submissions.

courses/assignments/submissions/fetch/co.description: Get all recent submissions and grading information for this assignment.
Get a summary of the most recent scores for this assignment.

courses/assignments/submissions/fetch/us.description: Get a submission along with all grading information.
Get all submission attempts made by a user along with all grading information.
Get a summary of the submissions for this assignment.
Get a copy of the grading report for the specified submission. Does not submit a new submission.

courses/assignments/submissions/remove.description: Remove a specified submission. Defaults to the most recent submission.

courses/assignments/submissions/submit.description: Submit an assignment submission to the autograder.

courses/lms/scores/upload.description: Perform a full scoring and upload scores to the course's LMS.

courses/upsert/filespec.description: Upsert a course using a filespec.

courses/upsert/zip.description: Upsert a course using a zip file.

courses/users/drop.description: Drop a user from the course.

courses/users/enroll.description: Enroll one or more users to the course.

courses/users/get.description: Get the information for a course user.

courses/users/list.description: List the users in the course.

lms/upload/scores.description:
Upload scores from a tab-separated file to the course's LMS.
The file should not have headers, and should have two columns: email and score.

lms/user/get.description: Get information for an LMS user.

logs/query.description: Query log entries from the autograder server.

metadata/describe.description: Describe all endpoints on the server.

stats/apirequest/query.description: Query the API request stats for the server.

stats/course/query.description:
Query metrics for a specific course.
Only the context course can be queried for.
Any course specified in the MetricQuery will be ignored for this endpoint.

stats/system/query.description: Query the system stats for the server.

system/stacks.description: Get stack traces for all the currently running routines (threads) on the server.

users/get.description: Get the information for a server user.

users/list.description: List the users on the server.

users/password/change.description: Change your password to the one provided.

users/password/reset.description: Reset to a random password that will be emailed to you.

users/remove.description: Remove a user from the server.

users/upsert.description: Upsert one or more users to the server (update if exists, insert otherwise).
